description: Cumulative counting sequence: method B (noun,adjective)-pairs with first term 4.
comments: Segments (generated as at A055168):  4; 4,1; 4,2,1,1; 4,3,1,3,2,1; ...Conjecture: every positive integer occurs.
example: Write 4, thus having 4 once, thus having 4 twice and 1 once, thus having 4 3 times and 1 3 times and 2 once, etc.
mathematica: s = {4}; Do[s = Flatten[{s, {#,Count[s, #]} & /@ DeleteDuplicates[s]}], {24}]; s (* Peter Moses, Mar 21 2013 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 27 2000
